Calls to the WinataDrivenAdapter API to manipulate the UI are dispatched to this handler.
Type of the Operation to be performed on the control Name of the Control Value to be assigned to the control /// Value used to customize the operations of the control Non-null for Find and Get OperationTypes, null for Set and Execute OperationTypes Reference inner exception to determine cause

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.HostedApplicationToolkit.DataDrivenAdapter.WinDataDrivenAdapter.AccEventListener
member.summary: Derived classes can subscribe to AccEventListener.AccEventOccurred to listen to all AccEvent traffic. This is instantiated on first access.
